body: Lmao the sheer ignorance about trans people in the comment section is almost cute. I forget hentai websites are mostly populated by virgins, teenagers, and virgin teenagers

If anyone wants a longer story like this, there's an 3d cgi comic that's pretty long called "different perspectives" it's like, literally the same idea, a guy who turns into the owner of the clothes he wears, he gets curious and buys new clothes and turns into a girl version of himself. It's a decent length too.

@Jhnpoiuy yeah, pretty much. I tend to be a person very interested in new experiences, I feel like I'd try anything at least once. So having a whole realm of experiences that I could never have, but half of the population is familiar with, makes me very curious/jealous. But if I were born as part of that group, I'd be interested in the other side(that i actuallyexist as a part of). It's really just a curiosity that I'll only ever be able to fantasize about unless we get the tech to induce feeling that we can't have. Neuralink may be a step towards that.
